definitions.title: vb. end, come to an end, complete
definitions.body: (only Psalm ) (NH id. complete; As gaâmru Lotz:TP.Register & deriv. COT:Gloss al.; Aram. [[גְּמַר]], gmar; Eth. 0agmara: (II); cf. also Ar. jam=ara collect, assemble)—
trans.bring to an end, complete,  [[אֵל גּׁמֵר עָלָָי]] Ps 57:3 God that completeth, accomplisheth, for me (LXX Gr Bi [[גמל]], & so Che doubtfully), [[יִגְמׂר בַּעֲדִי]] ´[[י]] Ps 138:8.
